title: Was it the white fanatic who killed Brewster democratically who visited Obama in the Oval Office?
subtitle: The false news sites treated an incoherent story claiming that white extremists had been arrested for the attack on vehicles in Charlottesville, Virginia, a Democrat who met Obama at the White House.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The man who was either the organizer of the 2017 White National Assembly in Charlottesville, Virginia, or the driver of the car that ran over the demonstrators, and killed one of them, is a democracy filmed to meet President Obama at the Oval Office.
